# Złotnica, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Złotnica  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Markusy, within Elbląg County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  west of Markusy,  south-west of Elbląg, and  west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
